field.name: summary
field.value: System.ArgumentNullException when trying to Resolve<> the component with internal constructor

field.name: description
field.value:
If the component has only internal constructor, an attempt to resolve that component via IWindsorContainer.Resolve<> leads to:
System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. Parameter name: types.
exception. The same component made internal (with the constructor made public) resolves normally. If the component cannot have the internal constructor by design, the specific Exception should be produced. But there is no visible reason why it cannot.

comment.author: ayenderahien
comment.text: A proper exception is now thrown
